name: Cell theory and cell as the basic unit of life

hints: 1. Use yellow square/focus square to target the location
2. Tap on the focus square to place object
3. Make yellow marker steady before placing the model for perfect augmentation
4. Try changing the position if object could not be placed
5. Pinch to zoom In and Zoom Out an object
6. Use ‚öô button to change 3D model settings
7. Use ‚Üª button to clear model
8. Use üè† button to go to Chapters list
